___count.description: The number of grid columns to draw

___padding.description: The left and right padding for each grid column (in pixels)

___gutter.description: The horizontal space between two grid columns (in pixels).

___width.description: The width of each CSS grid column (in pixels, including padding, without gutter)

___develop.description: allows to use the development version (debug.html) of the developer tools

___onGlobalMethod.description: method on the global object (window) which may be called to show the developer tools, for example from a bookmark

___button.description: allows to render a button that opens the popup

___tracker.description: track and validate pattern events (actions, resources, flags)

name: ax-developer-tools-widget
description: Provides developer tools to inspect the event bus and the application log, and the grid-alignment of widgets
